text: Shamed “ Today ” host Matt Lauer is “ bending over backwards ” to give his soon to be ex - wife Annette Roque everything she wants in their divorce — including a multimillion - dollar payout — because he feels so guilty for cheating with multiple women at work, according to friends. Lauer — who was axed by NBC bosses in November for a string of inappropriate affairs — has already agreed to pay Roque, his wife of nearly 20 years, up to $ 20 million, Page Six can reveal. The couple are now getting along amicably, the friends tell us — and are both spending time at their 12 - bedroom Hamptons pile, Strongheart Manor, as they prepare to finalize their divorce.
